#include <stdio.h>

#define MAX 100			//The maximum number of rows or columns

char field[MAX + 2][MAX + 2];
int ans[MAX + 2][MAX + 2];

void
incrementAns (int i, int j)
{
  for (int k = -1; k < 2; k++)
    {
      for (int l = -1; l < 2; l++)
	{
	  //if(k!=0 && l!=0)
	  {
	    ans[i + k][j + l]++;
	  }
	}
    }
}

int
main ()
{
  int rows, cols,start=0;
  while (true)
    {
      scanf ("%d %d", &rows, &cols);
      if(rows==0 && cols ==0){
       break;
      }

      if(start!=0){
       printf("\n");
      }
  	
       printf("Field #%d:\n",++start);
      
       
      
      for (int i = 0; i < rows + 2; i++)
	{
	  for (int j = 0; j < cols + 2; j++)
	    {
	      ans[i][j] = 0;
	    }
	}

      for (int j = 0; j <= cols + 1; j++)
	{
	  field[0][j] = 0;
	  field[cols + 1][j] = 0;
	}
      for (int i = 1; i <= rows; i++)
	{

	  field[i][0] = 0;
	  field[i][cols + 1] = 0;
	  char *p = field[i];
	  p++;
	  scanf ("%s", p);
	  for (int j = 1; j <= cols; j++)
	    {
	      if (field[i][j] == '*')
		{
		  incrementAns (i, j);
		}
	      //printf("%c",field[i][j]);
	    }
	}

      for (int i = 1; i <= rows; i++)
	{
	  for (int j = 1; j <= cols; j++)
	    {
	      if (field[i][j] == '*')
		{
		  printf ("*");
		}
	      else
		{
		  printf ("%d", ans[i][j]);
		}
	    }
	  printf ("\n");
	}
    }

}
